abstract: The Internet search giant joins other companies, all hoping to capitalize on the potential of Internet tools to help consumers manage their own health care.
snippet: The Internet search giant joins other companies, all hoping to capitalize on the potential of Internet tools to help consumers manage their own health care.
lead_paragraph: After a year and half of development, Google began offering online personal health records to the public on Monday.

headline.main: Google Offers Personal Health Records on the Web
headline.print_headline: Google Becomes the Latest Entrant to Offer Personal Health Records on the Web

abstract: Fighting Google, Microsoft has approached Yahoo with a narrower aim: a collaboration on Internet advertising.
snippet: Fighting Google, Microsoft has approached Yahoo with a narrower aim: a collaboration on Internet advertising.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks after walking away from takeover talks with Yahoo, Microsoft has made it clear that it still needs to create an Internet powerhouse that could rival Google  and that its interest in Yahoo has not waned.

headline.main: Pursuing Yahoo, Microsoft Shows Need for Web Franchise
headline.print_headline: Pursuit of Yahoo Shows Microsoft Needs a Franchise

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Steve Lohr
